mapper.update: UPDATE sys_notification_user SET is_read = '0', read_time = NULL, update_time = NOW() WHERE notification_id = #{notificationId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_notification_user nu JOIN sys_notification n ON nu.notification_id = n.notification_id WHERE nu.user_id = #{userId} AND nu.is_read = '0' AND n.status = '0'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_notification_user nu JOIN sys_notification n ON nu.notification_id = n.notification_id WHERE nu.user_id = #{userId} AND nu.is_read = '0' AND n.type = #{type} AND n.status = '0'

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_notification_user nu JOIN sys_notification n ON nu.notification_id = n.notification_id WHERE nu.user_id = #{userId} AND nu.is_processed = '0' AND n.type = 'todo' AND n.priority = 'high' AND n.status = '0'
